_source.text: 2. DH Ben Broussard or call up Adam Jones to play left and move Raul Ibanez to DH. Jones is better defensively, plus Broussard gives the team a good bat off the bench who can (sort of) play corner OF and first.

text: , **plus** Broussard gives **the** **team** a good bat off the bench who can (sort of) play corner OF and first.
2. DH Ben Broussard or call up Adam Jones to play left and move Raul Ibanez to DH. Jones **is** **better** defensively
